body:
For some reason the download urls generated by the package seems to contain newlines and/or other whitespace. It also seems like a part of the url is duplicated.

``` console
$ spack checksum fenics
==> Found 5 versions of fenics
  2016.1.0  https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/
                    /fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-2016.1.0.tar.gz
  1.6.0     https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/
                    /fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-1.6.0.tar.gz
  1.5.0     https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/
                    /fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-1.5.0.tar.gz
  1.4.0     https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/
                    /fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-1.4.0.tar.gz
  1.3.0     https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/
                    /fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-1.3.0.tar.gz

How many would you like to checksum? (default is 5, q to abort) 1
==> Downloading...
==> Trying to fetch from https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/
                    /fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-2016.1.0.tar.gz
curl: (3) Illegal characters found in URL
==> Fetching from https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/
                    /fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-2016.1.0.tar.gz failed.
==> Something failed on https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/
                    /fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-2016.1.0.tar.gz, skipping.
    (All fetchers failed for spack-stage-5eh1n5)
==> Error: Could not fetch any versions for fenics
```
title: fenics package is broken
